summary: The idea here is to make re-rolling a little less painful (tedious doesn\'t necessarily equal fun or challenging). Unlike most of the other batch files like this it will NOT cause you to gain levels! There are now custom versions for the 3 main archetypes (Rogue/Mage/Warrior).
descriptionHtml:
This batch file grants you 20k in gold, 100 lockpicks, advances several skills and grants all perks up to that skill level [u]without leveling your character[/u]. This will allow you to focus your perks in other areas as you level but it will not offer you any game-breaking advantages or disadvantages.

[Generic]
Items: 20,000 Gold, 100 Lockpicks
Skills: Speech 80, Smithing 50, Heavy Armor 30, Light Armor 30

[Warrior]
Items: 20,000 Gold, 100 Lockpicks
Skills: Speech 80, Smithing 50, Heavy Armor 30, Light Armor 30, Block 20, One Handed 20, Two Handed 20

[Rogue]
Items: 20,000 Gold, 100 Lockpicks
Skills: Speech 80, Smithing 50, Heavy Armor 30, Light Armor 30, Sneak 30, Pickpocket 30, Archery 30

[Mage]
Items: 20,000 Gold, 100 Lockpicks
Skills: Speech 80, Smithing 50, Heavy Armor 30, Light Armor 30, All Magicka 20

[size=3][b]Installation:[/b][/size]

1. Extract bat file to your root Skyrim directory
2. Load game and open console (~)
3. Type \"bat ######\" in console (replace ###### with bat name)

[size=3][b]Notes:[/b][/size]

If you feel Speech (or any other skill) is too high edit this line:

player.setav speechcraft [b]80[/b]

You can then delete the corresponding perks that are above the level you changed by referencing [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Speech]UESPWiki[/url].

[color=red][b]CAUTION: These files were created with re-rolling in mind (new characters). You can use them at any time but the skill level commands will overwrite your current skill level (this means, for example, if you are a level 80 smith you will be reduced to level 50 smithing when you run these batch files).[/b][/color]
author: Skyler
